messages.message:
Hi Anil,
list run system test - https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/63858

What API path do you suggest for checking the file delete status for app runs?

• GET on `v2/files/delete/jobs/<job-id>`  polls the file delete status, we can add in docs to just use this as this is a file-op and an API exists already 
• or add something like GET `v2/apps/runs/delete-file/<job-id>`
